title: First trailer for 'Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald' arrives
text:
First trailer for 'Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald' arrives 4:14pm EDT - 01:57 
Fans of J.K. Rowling's Wizarding World enjoy the first trailer for 'Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald.'' Rough cut. (No reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
